title: Luxury 1 Bed1 Bath Apartment in Greenpoint-  Available Now!- BS1
broker_fee: Broker fee equal to 1 month's rent.
posting_body: ['Luxury 1 Bed1 Bath Apartment in Greenpoint', 'This unit is designed to help you take a healthy break and connect with your favorites.', 'Take your pup to the dog run, or head to the Fitness Center for a workout.', 'Reserve the Private Lounge and take advantage of its chef’s demo kitchen, or reserve your spot by the outdoor pool and enjoy the Brooklyn views.', 'Take your pick—there’s more below!', 'At Your Service', 'Lobby café open to locals', 'Urban Room for resident meet-ups', 'Mail and package room for easy deliveries and pick-ups', 'Resident and community dog run on the Esplanade', 'Custom metal and concrete tile design in harmony with local architecture', 'Rooms with a View', 'Private Lounge with chef’s demo kitchen overlooking the East River and Manhattan skyline', 'Generous coworking space with adjoining terrace', 'Reservable conference rooms and dining table with seating for up to 14', 'Splash Decisions', 'Open-air pool deck and terrace', 'Grilling stations with prep table under pergola and nearby dining tables', 'Indoor pool lounge with refreshment station and TV, reservable for your private events', 'City views you’ll never get sick of', 'Stretch Goals', 'Fully equipped Fitness Center', 'Yoga and Cycle studio rooms', 'Outdoor Fitness Terrace', 'For more information or similar listings,', 'please contact:', 'Mike Agosto', '619-508-2712']
